text: Nagarjuna holding the Best film trophy at 62nd Filmfare Awards South for Manam Nagarjuna is an Indian film actor, producer and television presenter who works primarily in Telugu cinema and television. He has received nine state Nandi Awards, three Filmfare Awards South and a National Film Award- Special Mention. He received his first National Film Awards during 1996 as he produced, Ninne Pelladata, which has garnered the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Telugu for that year. His performance in Annamayya received a Special Jury Award. == CineMAA Awards == The CineMAA Awards are presented annually by Movie Artists Association Group, a television network based in Hyderabad. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="width:5%;" | Year ! style="width:25%;"| Film ! style="width:25%;"| Category ! style="width:5%;" | Result ! style="width:1%;" class="unsortable"| |- | style="text-align:center;"| 2006 | style="text-align:center;"| Mass | style="text-align:center;"| CineMAA Award for Best Actor - Male | | style="text-align:center;"| |- | style="text-align:center;"| 2012 | style="text-align:center;"| Rajanna | style="text-align:center;"| Special Jury Awards – Best Actor | | style="text-align:center;"| |- | style="text- align:center;"| 2013 | style="text-align:center;"| Shirdi Sai | style="text- align:center;"| Special Jury Awards – Best Actor | | style="text- align:center;"| |- | style="text-align:center;" rowspan="2"| 2015 | style="text-align:center;" rowspan="2"| Manam | style="text-align:center;"| Special Jury Awards – Best Film | | style="text-align:center;"| |- | style="text-align:center;"| Exceptional Performance | | style="text- align:center;"| |- |} == Filmfare Awards South == The Filmfare Awards South is the South Indian segment of the annual Filmfare Awards, presented by The Times Group to honour both artistic and technical excellence of professionals in the South Indian film industry. The awards are separately given for Kannada, Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam films. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="width:5%;" | Year ! style="width:25%;"| Film ! Oopiri | style="text-align:center;"| Filmfare Award for Best Actor – Telugu | | style="text-align:center;"| |- |} == Nandi Awards == The Nandi Awards are the awards that recognize the excellence in Telugu cinema, Telugu theatre and Telugu television, and Lifetime achievements in Indian cinema. Presented annually by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="width:5%;" | Year ! style="width:25%;"| Film ! style="width:25%;"| Category ! style="width:5%;" | Result !
